snippet: Lawrence Wright’s book “Going Clear: Scientology, Hollywood, and the Prison of Belief” explains that more people appear willing to discuss Scientology’s image problems.
abstract: Author Lawrence Wright has received threats from prominent Scientologists and lawyers representing the church despite the fact that his latest book Going Clear: Scientology, Hollywood, & the Prison of Belief is not a condemnation of their religion but rather thoughtful and well-researched exploration.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Wright’s book “Going Clear: Scientology, Hollywood, and the Prison of Belief” explains that more people appear willing to discuss Scientology’s image problems.

headline.seo: Scientology Fascinates the Author Lawrence Wright
headline.main: A Careful Writer Stalks the Truth About Scientology
